name: Cookroach
description:
After losing your job, you start your first day as a cook at Samsa's, tasked with providing the guests a small refuge from a world increasingly plagued by food shortages. 

You'll soon find that it takes a fair bit of creativity and improvisation to make comfort foods from unconventional ingredients.

Made in a two-day haze by Caro, who is crashing the noodly-soupy binary, spicy goblin Lina, noodly churro Lino & Nils, who's mostly soupy protein right now.

With very special thanks to Max, who self-identified as about 0.632 protein-y, for a pitch-perfect soundtrack (kitchen4-bad-song-2.wav).
